item.title: Isolated Israel Steps Up Threats Against Iran
item.description: Title: Isolated Israel Steps Up Threats Against Iran Tags: Israel, Iran, nuclear, war Post: Israel is feeling increasingly isolated in its efforts to pressure Iran to abandon its nuclear program. The United States has been reluctant to take military action against Iran, and European countries have been trying to negotiate a diplomatic solution.
